text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.napkon.de/fhir/CodeSystem/napkon-vaccination-module
    CodeDisplay
    2001To protect myself from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or from COVID-19
    2002To protect my private environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
    2003To protect my work environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
    2004Because everyone gets vaccinated
    2005Because I am afraid of being discriminated against due to my vaccination status (e.g. travel ban, work ban).
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008/version/20210731
    CodeDisplay
    74964007Other (qualifier value)
    385432009Not applicable (qualifier value)

name: COVID19VaccinationReasons
title: COVID-19 Vaccination Reasons
description: Individual reason for getting vaccinated against COVID-19

concept.display: To protect myself from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or from COVID-19
To protect my private environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
To protect my work environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
Because I am afraid of being discriminated against due to my vaccination status (e.g. travel ban, work ban).
